insert into ledger_zhidi (serial_number, area, project_name, calculate_invest, expect_invest, total_invest, audit_statistics, gov_confirm, gov_check, uncheck, remark, create_time, update_time) values (#{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{calculateInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{expectInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditStatistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{govConfirm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{govCheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{uncheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update ledger_zhidi set serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, calculate_invest = #{calculateInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, expect_invest = #{expectInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_invest = #{totalInvest,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, audit_statistics = #{auditStatistics,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gov_confirm = #{govConfirm,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, gov_check = #{govCheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, uncheck = #{uncheck,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
